text: Roebling Machine Shop is located in Trenton, Mercer County, New Jersey, United States. The building was built in 1890 and added to the National Register of Historic Places on September 4, 1997.The New Yorker, November 6, 1989 ==See also== *John A. Roebling's Sons Company, Trenton N.J., Block 3 *National Register of Historic Places listings in Mercer County, New Jersey *John A. Roebling ==References== Category:1890s architecture in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Trenton, New Jersey Category:Industrial buildings completed in 1890 Category:Industrial buildings and structures on the National Register of Historic Places in New Jersey Category:National Register of Historic Places in Trenton, New Jersey Category:New Jersey Register of Historic Places Category:Wire and cable manufacturers
title: Roebling Machine Shop
